A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm a giant\, deep Star Wars fan. I bleed Star Wars. This movie was everything that I wanted from the franchise. I was stunned\, blown out The Last Jedi\, in all the best ways. I LOVED this movie. This movie delved into the deeper workings of The Force in ways we have never seen before. Now if you'll excuse me\, I need to go watch this movie seven more times.
